about_the_game:
Run jump and shoot through various locations as Robot-X in this platforming shooter. Robot-X is 1 of 26 robots forged for battle, but when they are activated to protect the city, only one awakens: Robot-X. Robot-X must fight off evil and discover what went wrong on this retro journey.

have a friend join with a second controller in local co-op as Tin Can! Tin Can is Robot-X's sidekick built from scraps and coffee cans. (Requires 2 controllers)

4 levels from from all around the full game


challenging but forgiving (and not rage inducing) gameplay.
retro Inspired Gameplay!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: a working one of these
  • Graphics: enough for a 2d game
  • Sound Card: yes
  • Additional Notes: it's a 2d pixel art game, it doesn't need much to work.

short_description: A fast-paced platform shooter inspired by 90s classics. Follow Robot-X on a journey to protect the city from a new danger.
